contains_no_content_of_requested_type.description: Set to true if the input text contains no recipes. Otherwise, set to false.

entries.description: List of historical recipes extracted from text. If no recipes are found, return an empty array. Each object in this list has to be one individual recipe; and you may need to divide the input text into individual recipes.

recipe_text_original.description: Complete recipe text verbatim in its original language (preserve spelling, diacritics, and formatting), without page numbers or other formatting elements.

recipe_text_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the complete recipe text. Use null if and only if the recipe is already in modern English.

title_original.description: Recipe title exactly as it appears in the source (preserve spelling and diacritics). Use null if no title is given.

title_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the original recipe title. Use null if title_original is null or if the title is already in modern English.

recipe_type.description: Classify the recipe's primary category based on its main purpose and typical position in a meal. Use 'Household Recipe' for non-food items (cleaning, medicine, cosmetics). Use 'Preparation Technique' for base preparations without a complete dish (stocks, pastry doughs). Use 'Other' if the category is identifiable but not listed; 'Unknown' if classification is impossible.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients with original names, translations, quantities, and preparation notes. Return an empty array if no ingredients can be reliably separated.

name_original.description: Ingredient name as it appears in source (preserve spelling and diacritics).

name_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the ingredient. Use null if already in modern English.

quantity_original.description: Quantity as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

quantity_standardized_value.description: Numeric value of standardized quantity. Use null if cannot be standardized.

quantity_standardized_unit.description: Unit of standardized quantity. Use null if cannot be standardized.

preparation_note_original.description: How ingredient should be prepared, as recorded in source. Use null if none.

preparation_note_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of preparation note. Use null if none.

functional_role.description: Classify the ingredient's functional role in the dish based on how it is used in the recipe. Primary/base = main component; Fat/cooking medium = oil, butter, lard used for cooking; Seasoning/spice = flavor enhancers in small quantities; Thickener/binder = flour, eggs, breadcrumbs for texture; Garnish = decorative finishing elements.

luxury_signal_rating_1_7.description: Rate ingredient's status/luxury connotation in the historical period implied by text. 1 = everyday staple accessible to common households (e.g., bread, onions, local vegetables); 4 = moderately valued or regionally variable; 7 = high-status luxury item (e.g., exotic spices, imported delicacies, expensive cuts). Base rating on period-appropriate valuation, not modern standards. Use null if insufficient evidence.

origin_explicitly_stated.description: If the recipe text explicitly states an origin (e.g., 'Spanish oil'), record verbatim. Null if none.

cooking_methods.description: Cooking techniques used in this recipe with original terms and translations. Return empty array if none are mentioned.

method_original.description: Cooking method as it appears in source (preserve spelling).

method_modern_english.description: Modern English translation. Use null if already in modern English.

utensils_equipment.description: Cooking tools and equipment mentioned in the recipe. Return empty array if none are mentioned.

utensil_original.description: Utensil as it appears in source (preserve spelling).

utensil_modern_english.description: Modern English translation. Use null if already in modern English.

yield.description: Yield information with original and modern English versions. Return empty array if not specified.

value_original.description: Numeric value of yield as recorded. Use null if not specified.

unit_original.description: Unit of yield as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of yield (typically same as original). Use null if not specified.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of yield unit. Use null if not specified.

preparation_time.description: Preparation time with original and modern English versions. Return empty array if not specified.

value_original.description: Numeric value of preparation time as recorded. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_original.description: Unit of preparation time as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of preparation time (typically same as original). Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of time unit. Use null if not specified.

cooking_time.description: Cooking time with original and modern English versions. Return empty array if not specified.

value_original.description: Numeric value of cooking time as recorded. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_original.description: Unit of cooking time as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of cooking time (typically same as original). Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of time unit. Use null if not specified.

ingredient_categories.description: Boolean flags for ingredient categories relevant to historical culinary analysis. Use these to enable filtering and comparative analysis across recipes.

contains_meat.description: True if recipe contains red meat from mammals (beef, pork, lamb, veal, venison, rabbit, etc.). Exclude poultry and fish.

contains_poultry.description: True if recipe contains domestic or wild birds (chicken, duck, goose, turkey, pigeon, pheasant, etc.).

contains_fish_seafood.description: True if recipe contains any fish (freshwater or saltwater), shellfish, crustaceans, or other aquatic creatures.

contains_dairy.description: True if recipe contains milk, cream, cheese, or other dairy products. Note: butter has its own separate flag.

contains_eggs.description: True if the recipe contains eggs.

contains_butter.description: True if the recipe specifically contains butter.

contains_olive_oil.description: True if the recipe specifically contains olive oil.

contains_lard_animal_fat.description: True if the recipe contains lard or other animal fats that are not butter.

contains_alcohol.description: True if the recipe contains alcoholic beverages (wine, beer, spirits, etc.).

contains_refined_sugar.description: True if the recipe contains refined sugar.

contains_honey.description: True if the recipe contains honey.

contains_other_sweeteners.description: True if recipe contains sweeteners other than honey or refined sugar (e.g., molasses, maple, fruit syrups, dried fruits used as sweeteners).

contains_foreign_spices.description: True if recipe contains spices that were imported to Europe via long-distance trade (pepper, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, mace, ginger, saffron, cardamom, etc.). Exclude local European herbs like parsley, thyme, rosemary.

contains_luxury_ingredients.description: True if recipe contains ingredients that signaled high status in the historical period (truffles, caviar, ortolans, elaborate pastry work, expensive cuts, imported delicacies, etc.).
